was he with grief, though he tried hard to hide it in or- der not to sadden his dying father. "It is pain- ful, but it does one good. It uplifts the soul to see such men as the old count and his worthy son," said she. Of the behavior of the eldest princess and Prince Vasili she spoke disapprov- ingly, but in whispers and as a great secret.
